command: execute as @s at @s if entity @a[r=20] run particle arx:rat_ghost_despawn ~ ~1.5 ~
execute as @s at @s if entity @a[r=20] run particle arx:rat_ghost_despawn ~ ~1.5 ~
execute as @s at @s if entity @a[r=20] run particle arx:rat_ghost_despawn ~ ~1.5 ~
execute as @s at @s if entity @a[r=20] run particle arx:rat_ghost_despawn ~ ~1.5 ~
execute as @s at @s if entity @a[r=20] run particle arx:rat_ghost_despawn ~ ~1.5 ~
playsound undemon @a ~ ~ ~
scoreboard players set @s mp_max 100
scoreboard players set @s mp 100
effect @a[r=7] blindness 2 0 true
playsound mob.rat_eliminator.spawn @a ~ ~ ~
scoreboard players random @s custom_random 0 1000
event entity @s arx:test_for_low_hp
scoreboard players add @s mp 7
execute if score @s mp > @s mp_max run scoreboard players operation @s mp = @s mp_max
execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=0..300}] if entity @a[r=15, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] run playsound dissecting_fog @a ~ ~ ~
execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=0..300}] if entity @a[r=15, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] run tag @s add spell_activated
execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=0..300}] if entity @a[r=15, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] at @p[has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] run particle arx:sempra_a ~ ~2 ~

execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=0..300}] if entity @a[r=15, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] run damage @p[scores={tick_nosempra_a=0, tick_nosempra_b=0, tick_nosempra_c=0}, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] 20 entity_attack entity @p

execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=0..300}] if entity @a[r=15, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] run damage @p[scores={tick_nosempra_a=!0}, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] 15 entity_attack entity @s

execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=0..300}] if entity @a[r=15, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] run damage @p[scores={tick_nosempra_b=!0}, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] 10 entity_attack entity @s

execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=0..300}] if entity @a[r=15, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] run damage @p[scores={tick_nosempra_c=!0}, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] 0 entity_attack entity @s
execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=0..300}] if entity @a[r=15, has_property={arx:is_knocked=0}] run scoreboard players add @s mp -30
execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=500..700}, tag=low_hp] run effect @s regeneration 10 2
execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=500..700}, tag=low_hp] run tag @s add spell_activated
execute as @s[scores={mp=30.., custom_random=500..700}, tag=low_hp] run scoreboard players add @s mp -30

execute as @s[scores={mp=80.., custom_random=300..350}] if entity @a[r=15] run tag @s add spell_activated
execute as @s[scores={mp=80.., custom_random=300..350}] if entity @a[r=15] run scoreboard players add @s mp -80
playanimation @s[tag=spell_activated] animation.tsugunder.cast_spell
tag @s remove spell_activated
tag @s remove low_hp
tag @s add low_hp
execute if entity @a[scores={verify=2}, tag=scarlet_night] run tag @s add force_to_despawn
